dd.p: This section tells you how to:

ul.li: import the class required to execute an interaction
execute the interaction using a method of this class

dd.p: The execute()method of the com.scort.connector.connection.Connectionclass is required.
The table below details the parameters available for the execute() method.

stentry.CellBody: the input record object you intend to send to the host
the record object you have designed for data reception from the host
